description:
A couple of executables are missing from the package, I'm using the following as a reference:

https://code.launchpad.net/~anso/nova/ajaxterm/+merge/45068

The executables I notice are:

euca-get-ajax-console
nova-ajax-console-proxy

There is an ajaxterm package available in ubuntu, but the merge above makes it seem as if we have a modified ajaxterm, so it's possible this is missing too.
title: ajaxterm support missing from 2011.1.1 ubuntu packages

comments.content:
A couple of executables are missing from the package, I'm using the following as a reference:

https://code.launchpad.net/~anso/nova/ajaxterm/+merge/45068

The executables I notice are:

euca-get-ajax-console
nova-ajax-console-proxy

There is an ajaxterm package available in ubuntu, but the merge above makes it seem as if we have a modified ajaxterm, so it's possible this is missing too.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rlane

comments.content: Step one completed, I believe: Add our patches to ajaxterm in a friendly form to the Ubuntu packages.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren

comments.content: This should be adressed now (in trunk).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren
